com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class RectangleTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.AbstractBoundsTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.RectangleTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class RectangleTool
extends AbstractBoundsTool
    Draws outlined or filled rectangles/squares on the canvas.

      • strokeBounds

        protected void strokeBounds(Graphics2D g,
                            Stroke stroke,
                            Paint paint,
                            Rectangle bounds,
                            boolean isShiftDown)
        Draws the stroke (outline) of a shape described by a rectangular boundary.
        Specified by:
        strokeBounds in class AbstractBoundsTool
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        paint - The paint with which to draw
        bounds - The bounds of the shape to draw
        isShiftDown - True to indicate that the user is holding the shift key; implementers may use this flag to constrain the bounds or otherwise modify the tool behavior.

      • fillBounds

        protected void fillBounds(Graphics2D g,
                          Paint fill,
                          Rectangle bounds,
                          boolean isShiftDown)
        Fills a shape described by a rectangular boundary.
        Specified by:
        fillBounds in class AbstractBoundsTool
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw
        fill - The paint with which to fill the shape
        bounds - The bounds of the shape to draw
        isShiftDown - True to indicate that the user is holding the shift key; implementers may use this flag to constrain the bounds or otherwise modify the tool behavior.
